name: Skydrop
description:
Jump from the sky, weave your way through a mass of floating challenges, and parachute to the ground safely.

Fall past giant balloon sculptures in the sky, fly close to them to light up the balloons and score points. Earn bonus points by flying through rings, threading the needle, and entering unstable wormholes. Boost your multiplier by scoring to push your final result to dizzying heights. Just don't forget to open your parachute before its too late, your score means nothing if you land on a balloon too early, or smash into the ground at a lethal velocity!

Team Globex Corporation

  • James Wilkinson

Controls

ControlM/KBXbox PadMovementWASDLeft Stick
LookMouseRight StickOpen ParachuteSpaceY ButtonJumpLeft + Right Mouse ButtonL + R TriggersRestartTabBack/View ButtonReturn to MenuEscStart Button

  • Sound effects provided by Soundly.
  • Music provided by FilmMusic.io (https://filmmusic.io/)
  • Landscape material provided by Brushify
  • Landscape grass, landscape dirt, balloon rubber, landing zone concrete textures provided by Quixel
  • Noto Sans font by Google
